Title: The Blue Dragon Oathstone
Description:
The Azure Span has stabilized for now and more blue dragons have arrived... just in time.

It's time to return to the Azure Archives and reclaim the oathstone.

I would request your presence there, $n. You've been a great boon throughout this ordeal.
ObjectivesText: Accompany Kalecgos to claim the Blue Dragon Oathstone.
RewardText: The Oathstone is empowered once more. There is much to do... but the Azure Span is at least returning to what it once was.
